name: 2024 7th International Conference on Healthcare Service Management
content: Publication: The accepted papers of ICHSM 2024 will be published into International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM ISBN 979-8-4007-1016-2, which will be sent to Ei Compendex and Scopus for indexing, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). All submitted full paper will have opportunities for consideration for the Special Journal Issue. The final decision for paper selection will be made based on peer review reports by the Guest Editors. （1）. \[SCIE\] A special issue of Diagnostics (ISSN 2075-4418) in MDPI. This special issue belongs to the section "Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence in Diagnostics". https://www.mdpi.com/journal/diagnostics/special\_issues/7GIT1635TL （2）. \[SCI\] Special Issue Open Medicine (IF 2.1) http://mdecisionlab.csmu.edu.tw/file/open%20medicine.pdf
